content: Happy Weekend! Will there be support for Backdrop on IIS in its roadmap? Drupal continues to support it and I would like to move some of my projects to Backdrop.

Hi, Stan. Welcome to the Backdrop CMS community on Zulip. I'm your friendly neighborhood Dragonbot. Try '@Dragonbot help' for a list of things I can help you with. There are lots of friendly humans that hang around here, so please feel free to ask questions.

Here is a short (3 min) video to help you navigate Zulip. https://youtu.be/DN8YL2MrsSU
Hey @Stan :wave: ...have you tried using the same web.config and process/documentation that are available for running Drupal on IIS? ...what isn't working with Backdrop?
Hi @klonos , actually no. I wasn't sure if that would work. thanks for the idea. Will give it a go.
Yeah, Backdrop shouldn't have different requirements when it comes to that; so give it a go, and please remember to come back and report whether it works or not.
